name: Smothering Depths
outcome: As [AttackerName] is smothering [TargetName]'s face with her ample bosom, [AttackerHeOrShe] shifts subtly, adding a little magic spell into the affectionate tit-smothering!
miss: [AttackerName] tries to smother [TargetName] with [AttackerHisOrHer] boobs, but is fumbled by [AttackerHisOrHer] own tentacles!
statusOutcome: The spell acts fast, instantly knocking out [TargetName] and leaving [TargetHimOrHer] fast asleep with a throbbing, sensitive hard-on!
